name: Related Data Link Connection Identifier
title: RDLCI
definition: Identifies the logical connection address between the provider’s switch and the related circuit.
usageNotes: Required when the first position of the REQTYP field on the ASR Form is “V” or “X”, the BSC field on the Transport or EUSA Form is “F”, the VST field on the VC Form is blank, and the NVC field on the Transport or EUSA Form is populated.

Required when the first position of the REQTYP field on the ASR Form is “V” or “X”, the BSC field on the Transport or EUSA Form is “C”, the VST field on the VC Form is “B”, and the NVC field on the Transport or EUSA Form is populated.
exampleNotes: This example illustrates a numeric value but is left justified since it is treated as text.
